it.emarolab.owloop.core

Class Axiom.MappingIntent<I extends Axiom.Ground,C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.emarolab.owloop.core.Axiom.MappingIntent<I,C>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the Axiom.Ground used during synchronisation.
    C - the changes in the EntitySet of the ontology.
    Enclosing interface:
    Axiom

    public static class Axiom.MappingIntent<I extends Axiom.Ground,C>
extends java.lang.Object
    The class to track synchronisation changes.

    This class is used to keep a track of the modification in the descriptors or OWL structures. The modifications made during Axiom.Descriptor.readExpressionAxioms() or Axiom.Descriptor.writeExpressionAxioms(). For instance it can be used to monitor the evolution of the system or role back the changes in case of inconsistency. The data in this container should be copied in order ot be independent from the evolution of the architecture.
    In the current implementation this class is only instantiated by the helpers in the Axiom.Descriptor object in such a way that we have (void) element for getOntologyChanges() during reading(). Whereas while writing(), it contains instances of OWLOntologyChange. In case in which an Exception occurs during synchronisation, the value getIntent() would be null.

        public boolean wasWriting()
        Gives a flag ro know if the changes have been made during Axiom.Descriptor.writeExpressionAxioms() or Axiom.Descriptor.readExpressionAxioms().
        Returns:
        true if it has been generated during Axiom.Descriptor.writeExpressionAxioms(). false otherwise.

      • getTime

        public long getTime()
        Returns the time in which the changes were made.
        Returns:
        the construction time.

      • getIntent

        public final Axiom.EntitySet.SynchronisationIntent getIntent()
        Returns the changes within the OWl structure and internal state of the descriptor. If wasReading() is (true) those are the changes made on the internal state of the descriptor to become equal to the OWL ontology (EntitySet#synchroniseFrom(EntitySet)). If wasWriting() is (true) those are the changes made on the OWL ontology to make it equal to the internal state of the descriptor (EntitySet#synchroniseTo(EntitySet)).
        Returns:
        the differences between the OWL structure and internal state of the descriptor.

      • getGround

        public final I getGround()
        Returns:
        a copyGround of the Axiom.Ground.

      • getOntologyChanges

        public final C getOntologyChanges()
        Gets the changes made in the OWL ontology. It is null if wasReading() is true
        Returns:
        the changes in the ontology.

      • errorOccur

        public boolean errorOccur()
        Returns true if getIntent() returns null.
        Returns:
        true if an error occurs during reading or writing. false otherwise.

      • describesChanges

        public boolean describesChanges()
        Return true if {@link #getOntologyChanges()} = null.
        Returns:
        true if changes have been given during constructor. false otherwise.
